sentence.text: Besides, previous evidence suggested that AHI1 expression was changed in schizophrenia patients.
Furthermore, association signal between AHI1 variants and schizophrenia has been reported in several European samples.

In the present study, we first analyzed two expression quantitative trait loci (eQTL) datasets in healthy individuals and investigated the associations of eQTL of AHI1 with schizophrenia in independent European samples.
These results suggested that AHI1 is likely a risk gene for schizophrenia, at least in European populations.
